item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Junyi Xie, and I’m a software engineer with experience at ByteDance, Alibaba. I have expertise in Virtual Machine, Compiler, JIT, parallel optimization, binary size optimization, and hotfixing for C++/Swift. My projects include: designing and implementing a method-based JIT (ARM64) for CPython optimizing CPython runtime support for parallel execution (subinterpreters) optimizing CPython binary size, designing and implementing a hookable indirect function dispatch for the LLVM compiler backend designing and implementing ByteDance crash reporter system, designing and implementing iOS crash reporter, designing and implementing iOS & Android crash symbol & aggregation system optimize the performance of Taobao’s app and optimizing development environments.

item.title: Interpreter performance optimization and design key papers
